title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.5 - Class aa fresh surface waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.5 - Class aa fresh surface waters

State Regulations
(a) The
best usages of Class AA waters are: a source of water supply for drinking, culinary or food processing purposes; primary and secondary contact recreation; and fishing. The waters shall be suitable for fish, shellfish and wildlife
propagation and survival. (b) This
classification may be given to those waters that, if subjected to approved
disinfection treatment, with additional treatment if necessary to remove
naturally present impurities, meet or will meet New York State Department of

Health drinking water standards and are or will be considered safe and
satisfactory for drinking water purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
